channel.title: Books on Balakrishnan Vasudevan
channel.description: Recent content in Books on Balakrishnan Vasudevan

item.title: Books I want to finish reading
item.description: These are the books that I have in either paper form or on Kindle or PDF that I have been meaning to read, but did not go through with. My plan is to complete them before the end of 2022. System Desgin Interview by Alex Xu Designing Data Intensive Applications by Martin Kleppmann Networking and Kubernetes by James Strong and Vallery Lancey
